tool_description: Get Search Engine Results with simple API (SERP API)

api_list.name: SERP
api_list.description: Fetch search engine results based on a query.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query to retrieve results for. Example: `music site:youtube.com`.

optional_parameters.name: proxy
optional_parameters.description: Specify the country for the proxy to use.

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.
